name: add(_:withProcessingOptions:)
desc: Adds a Vision request to perform with the specified configuration.DeprecatedUse addRequest(_:processingOptions:) instead.

items.name: struct VNVideoProcessingOption
items.desc: Options to pass to the video processor when adding requests.

declaration:
func add(_ request: VNRequest, 
withProcessingOptions processingOptions: [VNVideoProcessingOption : Any] = [:]) throws
